text.intro:
Mapping Language: 
Representation of  Immigrant Communities in the Pacific Northwest, 1880-1930

Andrew Weymouth 2022 Capstone project for the University of Washington

Developing language used to describe immigrant groups in the Pacific Northwest from 1880-1930, reflects labor, industrial and land development interests, which may still influence our perceptions today.
